name: Tungsten(V) bromide
desc: Tungsten(V) bromide is the inorganic compound with the formula (WBr5). The compound consists of bioctahedral structure, with two bridging bromide ligands.
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
